name: Strike Back, Mythic

sections.body: When you make a melee attack as a readied action against a foe outside your melee reach, you can take a 5-foot step toward that foe. If you expend one use of mythic power, you can move your speed toward the foe instead. Neither of these counts toward the movement made during your turn.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your precise counterattacks degrade your foes' advantages in combat.
